articles.title: Kim Jong Un Attends Ceremony of Awarding Commendations to Fisheries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Attends Ceremony of Awarding Commendations to Fisheries
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of awarding party and state commendations to the exemplary officials, captains and fishermen in fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA) took place at the conference hall of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 First Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA, attended it.
					
					 Present there together with him were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam and other members of the executive committee of the KPA Committee of the WPK, and commanding officers of all services and corps-level units.
					
					 Prior to the awarding ceremony, Kim Jong Un made a significant speech.
					
					 Noting that he was very pleased to meet the exemplary officials, captains and fishermen in fisheries of the KPA, who are frontline soldiers for defending socialism, at the Party Central Committee, he warmly congratulated them upon receiving party and state commendations for having devotedly implemented the order and instruction given by the party.
					
					 He also extended heartfelt congratulations and warm thanks on behalf of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to the combatants in fisheries of the KPA for having successfully carried out the order for fishing operations issued by the party.
					
					 It has become possible to realize the strong desire of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to supply fishes to the service personnel on a regular basis, he said, adding there is nothing to spare in the world for the above-said persons in the field of fisheries of the KPA.
					
					 A high-pitched drive waged by the KPA for reaping a rich bean harvest and making big hauls in sideline fishing has opened a bright prospect for supplying not only soy-based food but also fishes to the service personnel on a regular basis, he noted.
					
					 He said this year's big successes convinced him that it was possible to make big fish hauls in the future, too, and got him feel reassured that it would be possible to improve the living of the service personnel significantly.
					
					 He once again highly praised the officials, captains and fishermen in fisheries for their loyalty with which they dynamically conducted the campaign for implementing the idea of the party and defending its policy to improve the living of the service personnel as intended by it.
					
					 Noting that there is no goal unattainable when they have such spirit of devoted service to the soldiers that they would take care of them as their parents would do, he indicated important tasks to be fulfilled by the field of fisheries of the KPA.
					
					 He ardently called on all fields of fisheries in the KPA to make all their boats fully loaded with fishes and return to their ports sounding whistles reporting full loads of fishes at all times.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding party and state commendations to the exemplary officials, captains and fishermen in fisheries of KPA was read out by KPA Vice-Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally conferred the commendations on them one by one. The recipients were overwhelmed with tears of great emotion and joy.
					
					 They renewed their firm determination to make big fish hauls every year so as to successfully materialize the intention of the supreme commander to supply abundant quantities of fishes to the service personnel.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Fisheries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Fisheries
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the meeting of activists in fisheries of KPA outside the building of the WPK Central Committee.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam and other members of the executive committee of the KPA Committee of the WPK and commanding officers of all services and corps-level units.
					
					 The participants enthusiastically cheered Kim Jong Un when he came out to the venue of the photo session.
					
					 Waving back to their enthusiastic cheers, he extended a warm salute to them.
					
					 He had a photo taken with the participants, expressing expectation and belief that the officials, captains and fishermen in fisheries of the KPA would make big fish hauls every year through dynamic fishing operations, always bearing in mind that supply service precisely means a battle for defending socialism, and thus  positively contribute to improving the living of the service personnel.

articles.title: State Commendations Awarded to Fisheries
articles.content:
State Commendations Awarded to Fisheries
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on December 20 promulgated a decree on awarding state commendations to officials, captains, fishermen and soldiers who greatly contributed to making big fish hauls.
					 According to the decree, Order of Kim Jong Il was conferred upon Jong Pong Jun, the title of labor hero upon Yun Yong Il and Pang Chol Ho and the title of Merited Fisherman upon Kim Jo Gyong, Pak Yong Nam, Kim Kyong Sok and Ham Tong Chan.
					
					 Order of National Flag 1st Class went to 29 persons, Order of Labor to 17, Order of National Flag 2nd Class to 69, Order of National Flag 3rd Class to 138, Medal of Distinguished Military Service to 2 and Medal of Merit to 229.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Commends Exemplary Persons in Fisheries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Commends Exemplary Persons in Fisheries
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un commended the officials, captains and fishermen in fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA) who have distinguished themselves in making big fish hauls by devotedly carrying out the order issued by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Letters of commendation of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, were awarded to Kim Il Man, Ri Yong Chol and 10 others.
					
					 A letter of commendation of Kim Jong Un, KPA supreme commander, was conferred on Ri Myong Chol.

articles.title: Watches Bearing August Name of Kim Il Sung Awarded to Fisheries
articles.content:
Watches Bearing August Name of Kim Il Sung Awarded to Fisheries
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung were awarded to the exemplary officials, captains and fishermen in fisheries of the Korean People's Army, who greatly contributed to making big fish hauls through dynamic fishing operations, holding high the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The recipients are Choe Kum Song, Sim Ryong, Ri Kang Il and 8 others.

articles.title: S.  Korean Police Suppression of KCTU under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Suppression of KCTU under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea Friday made public a statement accusing the south Korean conservative group of mobilizing puppet police forces to storm the headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and brutally suppress workers. 
					 As already known, on Dec. 22 the south Korean puppet conservative authorities hurled more than 5 000 policemen into the operation to arrest leading members of the Railway Trade Union on strike against the privatization of the railway service. They took such fascist action as destroying the front door with a hammer, firing tear liquid and walking off at least 130. 
					
					 The above-said bloody suppression perpetrated by the police forces against bare-handed workers are reminiscent of the unprecedented massacre committed by the successive military fascist gangsters, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This is the barbarous acts which could be committed only by the descendants of the inhumane "yusin" dictators, who hell-bent on harsh fascist dictatorship, regard tens of millions of toiling masses as slaves of the fascist rule and enemy. 
					
					 The Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea bitterly denounces the fascist action taken by the puppet conservative group to mercilessly trample down the just demand of the south Korean workers for elementary vital rights and democratic rights and brutally crack down on them on behalf of all workers in the north. 
					
					 The general strike of toiling masses sweeping across south Korea is an inevitable product of the unpopular labor policy of the puppet group and the moves to revive "yusin" dictatorship. 
					
					 South Korean people from all walks of life are now turning out in the actions of cursing the ruling quarters who make desperate efforts to pursue the pro-plutocracy policy for privatization, unhesitatingly reneging on election commitments to bring profits to a tiny handful of comprador and monopoly plutocrats in disregard of existence of toiling masses who account for an overwhelming majority of the population. 
					
					 Those forsaken by the working masses, the master of history, are destined to face disgraceful destruction. 
					
					 All Koreans will invariably voice full support to the toiling masses of south Korea in their indomitable actions for justice and truth.

articles.title: Nepalese President Supports Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Nepalese President Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean people achieved remarkable development under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il. They are now making great efforts to achieve prosperity of the country and protect its sovereignty under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward the ideas and cause of the great Generalissimos. The government and people of Nepal extend full support to the Korean people.
					 Ram Baran Yadav, president of Nepal, said this when meeting DPRK Ambassador to Nepal Kim Yong Su, who paid a farewell call on him on December 20.
					
					 The president also hoped that the friendly Korean people would realize the reunification of the country by their own efforts, free from intervention of foreign forces.
					
					 The people of Nepal will as ever make positive efforts to further develop the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries, the president added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Russian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Gennadi Zyuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on Dec. 20. 
					 It said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un,
					
					 I extend the warmest greetings to you with the approach of 2014 and wish the Korean people peace, prosperity and successes in socialist construction. 
					
					 I also wish you and your family good health and happiness. 
					
					 Sincerely yours.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Constitution of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Constitution of DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 41st anniversary of the promulgation of the DPRK Socialist Constitution. 
					 The constitution is a great socialist political charter provided by the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the constitution and their leadership. 
					
					 With a deep insight into the requirements of the developing revolution and the people, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il gave a scientific exposition of the issues arising in enacting the constitution and wisely led the work.
					
					 The DPRK Socialist Constitution was enacted and promulgated at the 1st Session of the 5th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA).
					
					 Thanks to its enactment, the DPRK people could be provided with legal conditions for fully discharging their responsibility and role as masters of the state and society.
					
					 The Law on Nursing and Upbringing Children, Public Health Law, Socialist Labor Law, Land Law and other laws serve as a solid legal foundation for giving full play to the advantages of the socialist system.
					
					 The 1st Session of the 10th SPA was a landmark event in the history of the DPRK constitution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that the Socialist Constitution was developed into Kim Il Sung Constitution, which includes the provisions on holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as eternal president of the DPRK and puts on a constitutional basis his idea on state building and the feats he performed for it.
					
					 With the Kim Il Sung Constitution, the DPRK could fully demonstrate its dignity as the country of the President, which is invariably glorifying his idea and feats in all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Now Marshal Kim Jong Un is creditably carrying forward the idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on establishing the Juche-oriented socialist constitution and immortal exploits they performed on its behalf.
					
					 The 5th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly codified the undying revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and developed the socialist constitution as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Constitution. 
					
					 Based on the constitution, which specifies Kim Il Sung as eternal president of the DPRK and Kim Jong Il as eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Korean people are confidently advancing along the road of socialism, the road of independence.

articles.title: Papers Mark Constitution Day
articles.content:
Papers Mark Constitution Day
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK Friday editorially mark the 41st anniversary of the promulgation of the "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the socialist constitution is the most revolutionary and popular one as it fully embodies great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the people-first doctrine. 
					
					 It is the undying exploits recorded in the history of the nation that the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il provided a firm legal guarantee for glorifying  the country as a genuine country of the people together with the socialist political charter of Juche, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The high dignity and happy life of the Korean people and great dynamism of Songun Korea making a leap forward  toward a thriving socialist nation despite all challenges and  hardships of history are ascribable to the exploits performed by the Generalissimos in the nation building guided by their idea of believing in people as in Heaven. 
					
					 All party members, service personnel and people should fully display the advantages and might of Korean-style socialism under the leadership of the great party with faith in sure victory and optimism. 
					
					 We should glorify the undying exploits of the Generalissimos for accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation of Juche for all ages. 
					
					 The Juche-oriented idea of nation-building and exploits of them serve as a banner of eternal victory and prosperity of Korean-style socialism and eternal treasure of the nation. 
					
					 To remain true to the idea and leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un is a sure guarantee for glorifying Korean-style socialism for all ages. 
					
					 Prosperity of socialist country can be guaranteed only when all service personnel and people single-mindedly uphold the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 All party members, service personnel and people should protect Kim Jong Un politically and ideologically and at the cost of their lives with intense loyalty to him. 
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that it is the great honor and privilege for the Korean people to have the socialist constitution shining with the august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Demand Chief Executive Fulfill Election Commitment
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Demand Chief Executive Fulfill Election Commitment
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Students affiliated to the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century held a press conference on Dec. 23, demanding the puppet chief executive halve the registration fee as she promised during the election campaign, according to south Korean CBS.
					 They underlined the need to find a democratic solution to the financial problems of universities by having discussions at the university registration fee committees from January next year.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Declares Actions against Disbandment of Opposition Party
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Declares Actions against Disbandment of Opposition Party
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement against Forcible Disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday.
					 Speakers at the press conference termed the regime's motion calling for the judgment on disbanding the UPP an outrage against democracy aimed to eliminate all the opposition political forces.
					
					 The authorities are keen on the reckless moves against the UPP, accusing it of including expressions like "progressive democracy" and "society where working people become its masters" in its program and calling for withdrawal of U.S. forces from south Korea, conclusion of peace treaty and abrogation of "Security Law", they charged. The authorities groundlessly claimed that those actions are all pursuant to the north's instructions, 
					
					 They urged the regime to immediately stop its moves to disband the party, calling on the people to turn out in actions against the moves.
					
					 They stressed that the organization would check the disbandment of the party together with people and force Park who was elected through frauds to step down.
					
					 Declared at the conference was the start of an all-people petition campaign against the disbandment of the progressive political party.

articles.title: Improvement of Peasants' Living Urged by S. Korean Internet Paper
articles.content:
Improvement of Peasants' Living Urged by S. Korean Internet Paper
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial Wednesday denounced the south Korean regime for sidestepping actions of peasants for their right to existence.
					 The editorial recalled that the peasants staged strenuous actions for their right to existence throughout the year.
					
					 It accused the regime of refusing to meet their demands till now.
					
					 On the contrary, the regime is clinging to base politically-motivated operations aimed to split their actions, sparking off their bitterer wrath at the regime, it charged.
					
					 The editorial urged the Park Geun Hye regime and the "Saenuri Party" to properly understand their surging indignation and make efforts to settle the issue of people's living.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Labor Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Labor Movement
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Teachers' organizations and academic bodies of south Korea, including the Council of Professors for Democracy, Trade Union of Professors and Council of Scientific Organizations, held a press conference outside the building of the Kyunghyang Daily News on Tuesday denouncing the puppet regime for suppressing the labor movement.
					  A statement was read out at the press conference.
					
					 It termed the police's violence at the offices of the Confederation of Trade Unions dictatorial outrage to stamp out the labor movement and snub the just demand of the workers.
					
					 It expressed the determination to protect the life of people from the anti-democratic violence of the regime and launch an extensive struggle together with the confederation and other labor organizations.
					
					 It also declared all-out actions against the Park Geun Hye regime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded in Poland
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on Dec. 21 to mark the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 It said:
					
					 Dec. 24 this year is the 22nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA.
					
					 The progressives are significantly commemorating this significant day to remember the precious feats performed by Kim Jong Il in developing the KPA into a matchless army capable of defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and global peace.
					
					 He was an outstanding strategist and brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu with matchless grit and iron will.
					
					 Under his leadership the DPRK turned into a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 He protected the sovereignty and security of the DPRK and peace on the Korean Peninsula from the threat of the imperialists by pursuing Songun politics.
					
					 We pay high tribute to Kim Jong Il, who made tangible contributions to the global cause of socialism.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries between Dec. 19 and 21 to commemorate the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, 22nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 They included meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Cuba, Sweden, Switzerland and Nigeria.
					
					 On display at the venues were photos documenting the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Books and photos introducing the DPRK were also displayed there.
					
					 Present at the events were personages of various social strata and masses in relevant countries.
					
					 Members of the DPRK missions there were also present on invitation.
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification lauded the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who inherited the ideas and natural character of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is fully demonstrating the national power of the DPRK by foiling every move of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers dare not provoke the DPRK as it turned into satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 This is a brilliant fruition of the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Committee hoped that the Korean people would register bigger successes in all fields, united close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The secretary general of the Switzerland-Korea Committee praised Kim Jong Suk for bringing up Kim Jong Il to be the successor to the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause and great leader.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Sweden and Switzerland.

articles.title: Works of Kim Jong Un Widely Disseminated Abroad
articles.content:
Works of Kim Jong Un Widely Disseminated Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The works authored by supreme leader Kim Jong Un have widely been disseminated worldwide this year.
					 The works includes his New Year Address, report at the March 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), conclusion at the national meeting of light industrial workers, talks carried by the organ of the WPK Rodong Sinmun and the organ of the Korean People's Army Joson Inmingun on the Day of Songun and letter to the participants in the great workshop for officials in the field of construction.
					
					 More than 10 000 media in the world including the Chinese People's Daily, ITAR-TASS, the Cuban paper Granma, Al Jazeera Satellite TV Broadcasting Service of Qatar reported the full text or gist of his New Year Address together with his portrait and photos showing his revolutionary activities.
					
					 Political parties, organizations and international and regional bodies carried it in their bulletins or posted it on their websites.
					
					 They included the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia, Communist Party of Brazil, British Association for the Study of Songun Politics, Society for the Promotion of Relations Between Austria and DPRK, Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also authored such works as "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" and "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party". 
					
					 Political Parties, organizations and institutions in various countries including the New Communist Party of Britain, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies and the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea published them in pamphlet with due ceremonies. 
					
					 Seminars, briefings and reading sessions on his works were held in various countries.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Shows Held in Russia, Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Shows Held in Russia, Mongolia
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia shows took place in Nakhodka, Russia and Ulan Bator, Mongolia from Dec. 17 to 21 on the occasions of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il, 22nd anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the same post and the 96th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The visitors included officials of government organs, political parties and organizations including the Nakhodka City Administration, the Assembly of the city, the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Ulan Bator City Administration and the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia.
					
					 A ceremony of visiting the Kimilsungia greenhouse was held in Guinea on Dec. 8.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded in Russia, Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded in Russia, Mongolia
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia shows took place in Russia and Mongolia from Dec. 17 to 21.
					 The visitors were deeply impressed to see the immortal flowers, praising the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il, a peerless great man.
					
					 The deputy mayor of the Nakhodka City of Russia said that the life of Kim Jong Il was dedicated to the country and people. Under his leadership the Korean people registered great achievements in defending socialism and building a thriving nation and the DPRK demonstrated its might in the international arena as a politico-ideological and military power, he added.
					
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said:
					
					 It is moral obligation and duty of progressive people to pay tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He frustrated the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended its sovereignty and dignity with his Songun politics, providing a sure guarantee for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The Russian people remember the feats performed by Kim Jong Il in laying a solid foundation for the development of Russia-DPRK relations and are convinced that the bilateral friendly relations would invariably grow strong under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice director of the Secretariat of Administrative Governor of Ulan Bator City of Mongolia said he was pleased to see the Kimjongilia show opened in Mongolia.
					
					 A member of the Guidance Council of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia noted that Kimjongilia came into full bloom in Ulan Bator in this winter, a clear indication of the deeply rooted and solid friendship between the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: British Organizations Praise Kim Jong Il as Banner of Victory
articles.content:
British Organizations Praise Kim Jong Il as Banner of Victory
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Dec. 17, the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Two years have passed since Kim Jong Il passed away but the reverence and yearning of the Korean people and other progressive people across the world for him are getting stronger, it said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader who successfully led the revolution and construction with his distinguished caliber while overcoming all sorts of hardships as a human being and a revolutionary and bringing miracles and great changes to the DPRK.
					
					 He is praised by all people as a prominent leader as he thoroughly embodied the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed the Songun politics in an all-round way to resolutely protect the sovereignty of the nation and socialism.
					
					 He won victory after victory in confrontation with the U.S. imperialists, taking the lead in the anti-imperialist struggle, and thus glorified the DPRK as a full-fledged and independent military power.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding guidance the June 15 joint declaration based on the spirit of "By the Korean nation itself" was adopted between the north and the south of Korea to make a breakthrough in the barrier of the division forced upon the Korean people by the U.S. imperialists and usher in a new era of independent reunification.
					
					 He wisely led the anti-imperialist cause of the world people for independence.
					
					 He is invincible might and banner of victory for us.
					
					 He will always be with us!

articles.title: Kim Jong Un asiste a ceremonia de condecoracion del partido y el Estado
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un asiste a ceremonia de condecoracion del partido y el Estado
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en la sala de reuniones del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea la ceremonia de condecoracion del partido y el Estado a los funcionarios, capitanes de barco y pescadores ejemplares de la rama pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Asistio a la ocasion el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam y otros miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC asi como comandantes de las unidades de tipo de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo.
					
					Antes de la condecoracion, el Mariscal pronuncio un discurso significativo.
					
					Dijo que estaba muy contento por encontrarse en el CC del PTC con los funcionarios, capitanes de barco y pescadores ejemplares, vanguardistas de la defensa del socialismo, y felicito calurosamente a los participantes que reciben las condecoraciones del partido y el Estado con el exito orgulloso de haber materializado cabalmente las ordenes e indicaciones del partido.
					
					Prosiguio que extiende sinceras felicitaciones y agradecimiento calido de parte del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il a esos combatientes de la rama pesquera del EPC.
					
					Senalando que se hizo posible realizar el deseo del Presidente y el Dirigente de alimentar normalmente los pescados a los militares, apunto que no hay nada que escatimar para ellos.
					
					Al igual que el cultivo de soya, se levanto tambien en el EPC la ola de captura de peces para autoabastecimiento, dijo y agrego que asi se abrieron las perspectivas de alimentar normalmente a los militares los platos de soya y los pescados.
					
					A traves de los exitos logrados este ano, tuve la seguridad de las capturas abundantes de peces en el futuro y del mejoramiento de las condiciones de vida de los militares, acoto.
					
					Evaluo reiteradamente la fidelidad de los funcionarios, capitanes y pesqueros quienes libraron la batalla para materializar la idea del partido y defender la politica del partido y mejorar asi las condiciones de vida de los militares segun el proposito del partido.
					
					No hay metas inalcanzables si atienden la vida de los soldados con el espiritu de servicio abnegado y el afecto de sus padres, dijo y presento las tareas importantes que se presentan en el dominio pesquero del EPC.
					
					Exhorto a todas las unidades del sector pesquero del EPC a llenar de pescados las bodegas y hacer repercutir mas alto en los puertos las sirenas que anuncian abundantes capturas.
					
					El vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, dio lectura al decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El Mariscal otorgo uno por uno las condecoraciones del partido y el Estado a los funcionarios, capitanes y pesqueros ejemplares.
					
					Ellos tomaron la firme decision de realizar el proposito del Comandante Supremo de abastecer de suficientes pescados a los soldados, al lograr cada ano la avalancha de peces capturados.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto junto con participantes en reunion de activistas de rama pesquera
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto junto con participantes en reunion de activistas de rama pesquera
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio en la sede del Comite Central del PTC junto con los participantes en la reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC.
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam y otros miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y comandantes de las unidades de tipo de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo.
					
					Cuando el Mariscal aparecio en el lugar de filmacion, los participantes le dieron efusiva bienvenida. 
					
					El les envio cordial saludo respondiendo a tales aclamaciones.
					
					El Mariscal expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios, capitanes y pescadores contribuiran activamente a la mejora de vida alimentaria de los militares al capturar cada ano gran cantidad de peces teniendo siempre presente de que la labor de intendencia es la batalla de defensa socialista y se fotografio junto a ellos.

articles.title: RPDC celebra dia de constitucion socialista
articles.content:
RPDC celebra dia de constitucion socialista
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hoy se cumple el 41o aniversario de la proclamacion de la Constitucion Socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Esta carta magna politica fue instituida segun la idea y la orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la legislacion.
					
					Percatados de la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo y del pueblo, ellos aclararon cientificamente los problemas surgidos en la institucion de la Constitucion Socialista y dirigieron sabiamente las labores para resolverlos.
					
					El Presidente hizo aprobar y publicar la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC en el primer periodo de sesiones de la V Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					En virtud de la Constitucion, las masas trabajadoras pudieron tener legalmente todas las condiciones que les posibilitan cumplir la responsabilidad y el papel como duenas del Estado y la sociedad.
					
					Se preparo la firme base juridica para agrandar las superioridades del regimen socialista al quedarse aprobados los reglamentos de varios sectores, incluyendo la Ley de la Crianza y Educacion de los Ninos, la de la Salud Publica, la del Trabajo Socialista y la de la Tierra.
					
					El Dirigente hizo aprobar en el primer periodo de sesiones de la X legislatura de la APS la Constitucion Kim Il Sung que legalizo enaltecer a este lider como eterno Presidente de la RPDC y glorificar sus ideas y hazanas por la construccion del Estado.
					
					Asi la RPDC pudo ser dignificada en todo el mundo como Estado del lider que materializa cabalmente la idea y las hazanas del Presidente en todas las esferas de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un da firme continuidad a la idea y hazanas de los Generalisimos.
					
					En el quinto periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la APS fueron refrendadas por ley las imperecederas hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente y la Constitucion Socialista fue proclamada como la Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il.
					
					Gracias a esta herramienta legal, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos pudieron avanzar firmemente por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo enalteciendo a Kim Il Sung como eterno Presidente de la RPDC y a Kim Jong Il como eterno Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.

articles.title: Periodicos conmemoran Dia de Constitucion Socialista de RPDC
articles.content:
Periodicos conmemoran Dia de Constitucion Socialista de RPDC
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los periodicos coreanos divulgaron este viernes sendos editoriales dedicados al 41o aniversario de la proclamacion de la "Constitucion Socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Rodong Sinmun subraya en su editorial que la Constitucion Socialista es la mas revolucionaria y popular que materializa plenamente el gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y la idea de dar primacia a las masas populares.
					
					Al instituir esa carta magna politica, los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il prepararon la garantia legal para convertir la RPDC en el pais verdadero del pueblo, lo cual constituye hazana imperecedera que brillara siempre en la historia nacional, destaca el diario y continua:
					
					La alta dignidad y la feliz vida que lleva hoy el pueblo coreano y el vigor de la Corea del Songun, que se va convirtiendo en un Estado prospero socialista superando los desafios y dificultades de toda indole, se deben enteramente a las hazanas de los Generalisimos realizadas en la construccion del Estado segun el ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como cielo).
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y todo el pueblo deben poner en pleno juego la superioridad del socialismo al estilo coreano y aumentar su poderio siguiendo la direccion del gran partido y teniendo la fe en victoria.
					
					Hay que glorificar para siempre las hazanas de los Generalisimos acumuladas en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					La autoctona idea y las hazanas de ellos son la bandera de victoria eterna y prosperidad del socialismo al estilo coreano y un patrimonio de la nacion.
					
					Apoyar fielmente la idea y la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un es la garantia decisiva para glorificar el socialismo coreano y lograr la prosperidad eterna de la patria socialista.
					
					Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados y habitantes deben defender al Mariscal a riesgo de la vida y en lo politico e ideologico.
					
					Minju Joson enfatiza que tener la Constitucion Socialista que brilla con los nombres de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu es un gran honor y privilegio que corresponde unicamente al pueblo coreano.
